授業方法:
2021 UPDATE: Most elective classes are expected to be conducted online for the Fall 2021 semester. A Google Classroom site will be used for course information and assignment submissions, and also for any outside of class contact with the teacher. This course is centered mainly on discussions based on the class projects and topics. This is NOT a lecture style course, it requires interactive English only discussions with classmates every lesson.
<Information for students permitted to take classes online>
Sessions will be held simultaneously via Zoom (meeting code will be posted on the Google Classroom site). Session 1 will be on campus, face-to-face. Lesson details will be updated on the Google Classroom site by 5:30 pm the day before our class time (Wednesdays). Email the teacher at mjchang@kwansei.ac.jp to get the Google Classroom site code to register.
*If the pandemic situation changes in September - October, students can check the Google Classroom site for teacher updated information and students will also be contacted individually by their KGU e-mail addresses to explain about online classes classes and assignments.
**If classes are to be held online, all classes will be live for synchronous style classes via Zoom.
Classes will include discussions, presentations, pair work and group work. This is an English only class. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.
